Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement complete SQLAlchemy ORM and FastAPI REST API for FSIPS schema

This commit implements the full database layer and API for the Functional Skill 
Integration & Practice System, enabling practice session tracking, exercise state 
management, and instrument configuration persistence.

Key components:
- SQLAlchemy 2.0 ORM models for all 6 FSIPS entities \(Instrument, Exercise, 
  ExerciseState, Session, SessionBlock, BlockLog\)
- Cross-database compatibility layer \(PostgreSQL production, SQLite tests\)
- FastAPI REST API with full CRUD operations and OpenAPI documentation
- Alembic migration infrastructure for schema versioning
- Comprehensive test suite \(16 tests passing\) with in-memory SQLite fixtures
- UTC-only time handling utilities
- Configuration system with environment-based settings

Architecture follows MNEMOSYS principles: no global state, explicit instantiation,
dependency injection throughout, and author-independent survivability.

All tests passing. Ready for Alembic migration generation.

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Establish PEP-compliant coding standards with strict ruff and mypy enforcement

Implement comprehensive Python coding standards based on PEP compliance,
enforced through automated tooling.

Documentation:
- Created Python Coding Standards section in docs/standards-and-conventions.md
- Documented philosophy: PEP-compliant first, strictly enforced, exceptions documented
- Established naming conventions \(pure PEP 8, no custom rules\)
- Mandated complete type hints for all public functions

Linting Configuration \(pyproject.toml\):
- Ruff: Enabled 10+ rule sets \(E, W, F, I, N, UP, B, C4, SIM, TCH, PTH, RUF\)
- Ruff: Line length 120, Python 3.13 target
- Ruff exceptions documented:
  - B008: FastAPI Depends\(\) pattern \(correct usage\)
  - E402: Model __init__.py \(enums before imports\)
  - RUF022: Logical grouping in __all__
- Mypy: Strict mode enabled with all strictness flags
- Mypy: Pydantic plugin configured
- Mypy exception: Alembic migrations \(auto-generated code\)

Code Modernization:
- Replaced typing.List/Optional with list/X | None \(PEP 604\)
- Replaced timezone.utc with datetime.UTC \(Python 3.11+\)
- Updated Generator imports from collections.abc \(PEP 585\)
- Added complete type annotations \(44 mypy errors resolved\):
  - All test functions: -> None
  - Generic types: sessionmaker[Session], TypeDecorator[T], dict[str, X]
  - Generator fixtures: Generator[T]
  - Custom types: Full method signatures with Dialect, Any

All checks passing:
- ruff: 0 errors \(102 auto-fixed, 35 documented exceptions\)
- mypy: 0 errors in 36 source files \(strict mode\)
- pytest: 16/16 tests passing
